UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Indolicidin analogs with broad-spectrum antimicrobial activity and low hemolytic activity
Literature.Author: Smirnova MP, Kolodkin NI, Kolobov AA, Afonin VG, Afonina IV, Stefanenko LI, Shpen VM, Shamova OV

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ML-35p(MIC50=14.6±5.1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC50=29.2±10.21µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC50=11.3±3.06µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC50=12.5µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis L2(MIC50=14.6±5.1µg/ml),Escherichia coli M17(MIC50=3.5±0.22µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25293(MIC50=4.5±0.18µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 710A(MIC50=5.1±0.25µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium L3(MIC50=4.8±0.16µg/ml)
